page.title: 04 NEWINGREEN VILLAGE
page.content: Newingreen,originally "Newinn Green"is situated at the junction of the A.20 and the B.2068. In the 1920's Newingreen had its own Post-Office,school and village constable.Now it is a small collection of houses around a motel and a garage. There are no other amenities or shops in the village. Sellinge is the nearest shopping area but most people shop in Ashford or Folkestone. There is a bus service and the motorway and mainline stations of Westernhangar and Sandling are within three miles. Most people use private transport.
